holidays.title: National Pizza Party Day
holidays.description: Pizza's the very definition of a good time and your options are plentiful.

holidays.title: National Walnut Day
holidays.description: They’re great for your heart, brain, and bones; and you can incorporate them into any meal.

holidays.title: Bike To School Day
holidays.description: Check out our fun ideas to enjoy Bike To School Day with the family.

holidays.title: International Child Helpline Day
holidays.description: International Child Helpline Day takes place annually to celebrate the work of child helplines.

holidays.title: International Day Against Homophobia Transphobia and Biphobia
holidays.description: International Day Against Homophobia, Transphobia and Biphobia is an important L.G.B.T.Q. awareness holiday.

holidays.title: International Virtual Assistants Day
holidays.description: Dedicated to virtual assistants, this is a day to recognize their hard work, dedication, and perseverance.

holidays.title: NASCAR Day
holidays.description: Enjoy the NASCAR event while also helping children across the country.

holidays.title: National Bike to Work Day
holidays.description: This day aims to incentivize us to switch our regular commute with bikes.

holidays.title: National Cherry Cobbler Day
holidays.description: Cherry cobbler is a baked dessert with a rich cherry filling and a biscuit dough crust.

holidays.title: National Defense Transportation Day
holidays.description: Commemorate National Defense Transportation Day by celebrating the ones behind the wheels!

holidays.title: National Graduation Tassel Day
holidays.description: It’s time to relive your favorite Graduation Day memories!

holidays.title: National Idaho Day
holidays.description: Hey, Idahoans, today we celebrate you!

holidays.title: National Linda Day
holidays.description: Linda means ‘beautiful,’ and this is the day to celebrate the name!

holidays.title: National Mushroom Hunting Day
holidays.description: Pack yourself with the essential info for the mushroom hunt into the wild.

holidays.title: National Pinkfix Day
holidays.description: With guidance from experts and your own learning, you can make wise decisions about your money.

holidays.title: NF Awareness Day
holidays.description: Help raise awareness of neurofibromatosis to support research to end this condition this Neurofibromatosis Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Pack Rat Day
holidays.description: Get rid of the old and make space for the new!

holidays.title: Pinot Grigio Day
holidays.description: Get a bottle of pinot grigio, bring your glass, and celebrate the day lightly.

holidays.title: Shades Day
holidays.description: It’s time to slide on some sunshades and lend a helping hand to families in need.

holidays.title: Walk Safely To School Day
holidays.description: Join us as we encourage Australia’s tiny tots to ditch the bus and walk to school.

holidays.title: World Hypertension Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness of this condition to prevent strokes or other diseases.

holidays.title: World Information Society Day
holidays.description: Raise awareness of the internet and I.C.T. so that we can bridge the digital divide this World Telecommunication and Information Society Day.

holidays.title: Cindy Smock’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is passionate about educating children and advising them to avoid sin.

holidays.title: Elle Winter’s Birthday
holidays.description: With an impressive career at such a young age, Elle Winter's future looks blindingly bright.

holidays.title: Kandi Burruss’s Birthday
holidays.description: There's nothing Kandi can't do, music and business-wise at least. She’s a boss!

holidays.title: Karrueche Tran’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress, model, and fashionista, is on her way to striking it big.

holidays.title: LuAnn de Lesseps’s Birthday
holidays.description: From becoming a countess to headlining a hit reality show, de Lesseps has done it all.
